description: This file defines a static method `PostMortem` within the `Server` class in the `WPEFramework::PluginHost` namespace. The method handles generating dump or post-mortem logs based on service and connection states, using system logging functions and connection signals.

classes.name: Server
classes.description: A class providing static utility methods related to service post-mortem handling within the plugin host framework.

methods.name: void PostMortem(Service & service,const IShell::reason why,RPC::IRemoteConnection * connection)
methods.description: Handles trigger of post-mortem logs for a service, distinguishing between internal and external process contexts, and invoking system dumping or connection signals accordingly.

ctags.name: PostMortem
ctags.pattern: /^\/* static *\/ void Server::PostMortem(Service& service, const IShell::reason why, RPC::IRemoteC/
